title: Ewbank on Life in Brazil - describe patterns

content.question: Which of the following describes an important similarity between the institution of slavery in Brazil and in the United States?

choices.label: In both countries, enslaved people had relative autonomy compared to slavery in the rest of the world.
In both countries, the government reinforced the slave trade into the mid-1800s to grow the institution.
In both countries, the labor of enslaved people was primarily used for public works projects.
In both countries, private individuals exploited enslaved people for profit.

content.answer: In both countries, private individuals exploited enslaved people for profit.

topic.text: 2.16: Diasporic Connections: Slavery and Freedom in Brazil
